page.title: 12Headmasters Interview cont.
page.content: and sports,school activities for children such as concerts,bazaars and sales.There is also the pigeon fanciers club and pub activities such as dances are well attended. {How far is church-going still a {regular feature of country life?}Most major festivals are well attended such as Christmas and Easter.Out of a population of 400 there is a regular congregation of about 25.For family services(held once a month)80-90 people regularly attend.The whole school goes to church once a term;for a carol service at Christmas,in the spring term Ash Wednesday and Ascencion day in the summer term.There is a morning assembly every day. {Do new-comers and older inhabitants {mix together?}There is unity within the village,this is not a problem.This is because many of the older people
